welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Baguio! Known for its cool climate, stunning landscapes, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Good Taste Restaurant
restaurants.description: Good Taste Restaurant is a asian restaurant located in Lungsod ng Baguio.
restaurants.address: Otek St, 2600 Lungsod ng Baguio, Baguio City

restaurants.name: Forest House
restaurants.description: Forest House is a café located in Lungsod ng Baguio.

restaurants.name: Good Taste Restaurant
restaurants.description: Good Taste Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Lungsod ng Baguio.
restaurants.address: Baguio Center Mall (Dangwa Terminal), 2600 Lungsod ng Baguio, Baguio City

restaurants.name: Fortune Hongkong Seafood Restaurant
restaurants.description: Fortune Hongkong Seafood Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Lungsod ng Baguio.
restaurants.address: 14-16 Otek Street, Rizal Monument Area, 2600 Lungsod ng Baguio, Baguio City

restaurants.name: Army Navy Burger + Burrito
restaurants.description: Army Navy Burger + Burrito is a burrito restaurant located in Benguet.
restaurants.address: GF-12 Puso ng Baguio Bldg, Session Rd, 2600 Baguio City, Benguet

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Loakan Airport serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
